sections.heading: prevention device; inspection.Persons employed by political subdivisions to inspect plumbing fixtures shall inspect showers and bathtubs for compliance with section 71-1569

sections.text:
71-1570.Scald prevention device; inspection.

Persons employed by political subdivisions to inspect plumbing fixtures shall inspect showers and bathtubs for compliance with section 71-1569.

SourceLaws 1987, LB 264, ยง 2.
